screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .piximod file in Nightradio PixiTracker 1.6
screenshot.caption: PIXIMOD file open in Nightradio PixiTracker 1.6

description: PixiTracker is a free tool that amateur audio enthusiasts primarily use. They often use the program to create musical sketches, chiptunes, and sound experiments.

The program comes with PIXIMOD files but allows you to create and save your own songs as PIXIMOD files. To create a PIXIMOD file, lick the three-line hamburger menu icon and then select Save Song As .

images.caption: PIXIMOD file open in Nightradio PixiTracker 1.6
